Talk1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Out on night patrol already? I'd expect
nothing less from you.
Talk1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Are you out patrolling the village?
You do so much for us.
Talk1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Are you patrolling the village even in this
rain? I'd expect nothing less from you.
Talk1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>If you take the cloth I gave you to the
<clr:0000>dye shop in Hateno Village<clr:ffff>, they should
be able to do something with it.<sp:0:4:0><snd:LaughS_01>It would make me so happy to know that
you were putting it to good use!<sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Plus, it'll be great advertising for Lurelin Village!<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk1030:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>My hometown is <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>, a small
fishing village along the shore southeast
of here.<sp:0:4:0>It's been suffering constant <clr:0000>pirate <clr:ffff>attacks.
I've heard it's almost entirely <clr:0000>destroyed<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:4:0>At least the villagers fled without any
loss of life, or so they say.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>But what good is it if all their homes are
destroyed? <sp:5:0:0>I'm afraid that the village
is finished.<sp:0:4:0>My poor father...<sp:5:0:0>he was the head of
Lurelin Village.<sp:0:4:0><snd:Think>That village was his whole life. <sp:5:0:0>If it's
really gone, I worry that the shock could
finish him.
Talk1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>Lover's Pond<clr:ffff> on <clr:0000>Tuft Mountain<clr:ffff>, the place
where Rhodes and I met, is a sacred pond
rumored to help you find your true love.<sp:0:4:0>It used to be a popular spot, despite the
steep climb to get there.
Talk1031:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>Where I'm from, we believed in welcoming
everyone with a smile.<sp:0:4:0>That's why I don't want anyone from home
to see me so down.
Talk1014:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal_01>What is it, Rhodes? <sp:5:1:0>Surely it's not time
to wake up yet... <sp:5:1:0>Oh?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>I'm sorry. <sp:5:1:0>I thought you were my husband.
Talk1032:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:TalkPositive>Oh...you're back again. *sigh*<sp:0:4:0>I'm sorry... I still don't have it in me to
be very welcoming.
Talk1015:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>We love watching the tides by moonlight.
Thank you for giving us our shores back.
Talk1033:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>I'm sorry... I don't have it in me to be
very welcoming right now.
Talk1016:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>We love watching the tides in the sunrise.
Thank you for giving us our shores back.
Talk1034:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'll take care of it later. Maybe by
tomorrow morning.
Talk1017:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I think we'd still be together anyway,
even if we had met at the other pond on
<clr:0000>Ebon Mountain<clr:ffff> to the <clr:0000>northeast<clr:ffff> of here.
Talk1035:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>My hometown is <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>, a small
fishing village along the shore southeast
of here.<sp:0:4:0>It's suffered constant <clr:0000>pirate <clr:ffff>attacks.
I've heard it's almost entirely <clr:0000>destroyed<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:4:0>I did hear that the villagers fled without
any loss of life, and that the pirates had
been driven off...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>But what good is it if all their homes
are destroyed? <sp:5:0:0>I'm afraid that the village
is finished.<sp:0:4:0>My poor father...<sp:5:0:0>he was the head of
Lurelin Village.<sp:0:4:0><snd:Think>It was his whole life. <sp:5:0:0>I worry a lot about
how its loss is affecting him.
Talk1036:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>My hometown is <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>, a small
village along the shore southeast of here.<sp:0:4:0>I think I told you that it's been suffering
constant <clr:0000>pirate <clr:ffff>attacks to the point where
it's almost entirely <clr:0000>destroyed<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>At least the villagers fled without any
loss of life, or so they say.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>But what good is it if all their homes
are destroyed? <sp:5:0:0>I'm afraid that Lurelin
is finished.<sp:0:4:0>My poor father...that place was his
whole life.<sp:0:4:0><snd:Think>He was the head of the village, so I worry
about how its loss is affecting him.
Talk1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>The flag I made is getting an even better
reception than I'd hoped. <sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>I hear that even Mubs, who set up shop
all the way out at Lookout Landing, hung
it up over there!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>My hope is that the flag lets people all
over Hyrule know about Lurelin, <sp:5:0:0>even if
they never come here.
Talk1037:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>My hometown is <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>, a small
village along the shore southeast of here.<sp:0:4:0>I think I told you that it's suffered
constant <clr:0000>pirate <clr:ffff>attacks to the point
where it's almost entirely <clr:0000>destroyed<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I did hear that the villagers fled without
any loss of life, and that the pirates had
been driven off...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>But what good is it if all their homes
are destroyed? <sp:5:0:0>I'm afraid that Lurelin
is finished.<sp:0:4:0>My poor father...that place was his
whole life.<sp:0:4:0><snd:Think>He was the head of the village, so I worry
about how its loss is affecting him.
Talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>The flag I made is getting a lot of praise
for the way it doesn't tear or smudge,
no matter what the weather's like.<sp:0:4:0>I hear that even Mubs, who set up shop
all the way out at Lookout Landing, hung
it up over there!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>My hope is that the flag lets people all
over Hyrule know about Lurelin, <sp:5:0:0>even if
they never come here.
Talk1038:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I've been giving away the flags I made.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0500>I've enjoyed seeing everyone again after
so long. <sp:5:0:0>It's made me reluctant to go back
to Hateno Village.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>So my husband and I think we'll take it
easy here for a while.
Talk1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Did you find a use for the cloth I
gave you?<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0701><clr:ffff>If you take it to the <clr:0000>dye shop in
Hateno Village<clr:ffff>, they should be able
to do something with it.<sp:0:4:0><snd:LaughS>It would make me so happy to know that
you were putting it to good use!<sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Plus, it'll be great advertising for Lurelin Village!<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'll take care of it later. Maybe by
this afternoon.
Talk1039:
We've moved! Come find us in our old
hometown, Lurelin Village.<sp:0:4:0>Let this house be used as a rest stop for
travelers passing through Hateno Village.
                                 -Ralera and Rhodes
Talk1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>My husband and I met at <clr:0000>Lover's Pond<clr:ffff>
on <clr:0000>Tuft Mountain<clr:ffff> behind the house.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>Maybe nobody believes it anymore, but
it used to be a rumor that couples who
met there were destined for each other.<sp:0:4:0>It used to be a popular spot, despite the
steep climb to get there.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0500>Thinking back on it, maybe so many
couples fell in love there because they
all came looking for love to begin with.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>Even so, I think the two of us really were
destined to find each other.
Talk1022:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'll take care of it later. Maybe by
this evening.
Talk1023:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'll take care of it later. Hopefully before it
gets too dark.
Talk1040:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Someone told me Princess Zelda used to
go there often.
Talk1024:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oh...a visitor. *sigh*<sp:0:4:0>I'm sorry... I don't have it in me to be
very welcoming right now.
Talk1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Everyone's calling you the town savior.<sp:0:4:0>And I'm no exception. <sp:5:0:0>I even credit you
with the flag I made for Lurelin.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Have you thought about bringing the
cloth I gave you to the <clr:0000>dye shop in
Hateno Village<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0><snd:LaughS_01>It would make me very happy to know that
you'd found your own use for it.
Talk1008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Up early patrolling? I'd expect nothing
less from you.
